alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 16 at 4:59PM EDT until April 16 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Lowndes County in south central Georgia... Southern Brooks County in south central Georgia... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 459 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southeast of Boston, or 8 miles southwest of Quitman, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Quitman, Valdosta, I-75 At Exit 16, Dixie, Grooverville, Kinderlou, Pidcock, Nankin, Empress, Clyattville, Brooks Co A/p, Blue Springs and I-75 At Exit 22. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
